statements: SELECT collection_id, collection_name, total_nfts FROM nft_collections;
SELECT * FROM nft_collections WHERE collection_id = 1;
SELECT collection_name, total_nfts, collection_id FROM nft_collections WHERE total_nfts > 10;
SELECT collection_id, total_nfts, collection_name FROM nft_collections ORDER BY collection_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM nft_collections WHERE collection_name LIKE '%%Art%%';
SELECT collection_name, total_nfts FROM nft_collections WHERE collection_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM nft_collections ORDER BY collection_id DESC;
SELECT collection_name, total_nfts FROM nft_collections WHERE total_nfts > 100 ORDER BY total_nfts ASC;
SELECT collection_name, total_nfts FROM nft_collections WHERE collection_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT collection_name, total_nfts FROM nft_collections WHERE total_nfts BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM nft_collections;
SELECT collection_name, creator_id, created_at FROM nft_collections;
SELECT * FROM nft_items WHERE collection_id = 'a1b2c3';
SELECT item_name, item_type FROM nft_items ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM nft_items WHERE item_type = 'Art' AND item_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM nft_collections WHERE collection_name = 'Art Collection'
SELECT collection_name, creator_id FROM nft_collections ORDER BY creator_id ASC
SELECT collection_name, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items FROM nft_collections JOIN nft_items ON nft_collections.collection_id = nft_items.collection_id GROUP BY collection_name
SELECT collection_name, item_name, item_type FROM nft_collections JOIN nft_items ON nft_collections.collection_id = nft_items.collection_id WHERE item_type = 'Digital Art' ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT collection_name, item_name, item_description FROM nft_collections JOIN nft_items ON nft_collections.collection_id = nft_items.collection_id WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM nft_collection;
SELECT nft_name, owner_id FROM nft_collection ORDER BY nft_name ASC;
SELECT owner_name, total_nfts_owned FROM nft_owner WHERE total_nfts_owned > 10;
SELECT nft_id, owner_id, transaction_date FROM nft_transaction WHERE transaction_type = 'sale';
SELECT * FROM nft_owner ORDER BY total_nfts_owned DESC, owner_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM nft_collection WHERE owner_id = 1 ORDER BY nft_name DESC;
SELECT nft_name, COUNT(*) AS total_owned FROM nft_collection GROUP BY nft_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_owned DESC;
SELECT nft_name, owner_name FROM nft_collection JOIN nft_owner ON nft_collection.owner_id = nft_owner.owner_id WHERE nft_collection.owner_id = 2 ORDER BY nft_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_type, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM nft_transaction GROUP BY transaction_type HAVING COUNT(*) >= 1 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT nft_name, owner_name, total_nfts_owned FROM nft_collection JOIN nft_owner ON nft_collection.owner_id = nft_owner.owner_id ORDER BY total_nfts_owned DESC, nft_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM NFT_Collections;
SELECT collection_name, owner_id FROM NFT_Collections ORDER BY collection_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM NFT_Items WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT owner_name, total_items_owned FROM NFT_Owners WHERE total_items_owned < 10 ORDER BY owner_name;
SELECT view_name FROM NFT_Views WHERE view_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM NFT_Collections;
SELECT collection_name, owner_id FROM NFT_Collections ORDER BY collection_name DESC;
SELECT collection_name, count(id) AS total_items FROM NFT_Collections JOIN NFT_Items ON NFT_Collections.id = NFT_Items.collection_id GROUP BY collection_name;
SELECT owner_name, total_items_owned FROM NFT_Owners WHERE total_items_owned > 10 ORDER BY total_items_owned DESC;
SELECT view_name, view_description FROM NFT_Views WHERE LENGTH(view_description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM owners
SELECT owner_id, owner_name, location FROM owners ORDER BY owner_name DESC
SELECT nft_id, nft_name, nft_description FROM nfts WHERE owner_id = 1
SELECT view_id, view_name, nft_count, collection_count FROM views WHERE nft_count > 10
SELECT collection_name, COUNT(nft_id) AS nft_count FROM collections JOIN nft_collections ON collections.collection_id = nft_collections.collection_id GROUP BY collection_name
SELECT * FROM owners WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT nft_name, nft_description FROM nfts ORDER BY nft_name DESC;
SELECT owner_name, location FROM owners WHERE location IS NOT NULL AND owner_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT nft_name, collection_name FROM nfts JOIN collections ON nfts.nft_id = nft_collections.nft_id WHERE collection_name = 'Digital Art';
SELECT nft_name, view_name FROM nfts JOIN views ON nfts.owner_id = views.view_id ORDER BY view_name ASC, nft_name DESC;
